nodes.text: Miner droids were automatons used by the Trade Federation on the Outer Rim volcano planet Eos. The droids mined Eos for the droid factory there. The droids were oval-shaped and followed set routes. In 32 BBY, Vana Sage encountered the droids after escaping a Trade Federation contract infringement.

The miner droids appear in mission 4 of the 2001 video game Star Wars: Starfighter. In that mission, the player has the option of hunting down all eight to destroy them and fulfill the bonus objective, although doing so does not affect the storyline.
